evidence.text: At oral argument, Plaintiffs abandoned their request for relief that could be construed as a mandatory injunction and clarified that they seek only a prohibitory injunction and parallel stay under the APA.

At oral argument, Plaintiffs abandoned their request for relief that could be construed as a mandatory injunction and clarified that they seek only a prohibitory injunction and parallel stay under the APA.
They request that the Court enjoin and stay the April 2nd and June 2nd actions and any reallocation or disbursement of the awarded funds to any other party.

extracted.value: Enjoin and stay the April 2nd and June 2nd actions

extracted.value: Prevent any reallocation or disbursement of the awarded funds to any other party
